name: Sing-Song Ding-Dong
description:
An entry for the 2019 Js13kGames Competition - Still work in progress!

Turfed out of their home for their awful singing, the player must explorer the Mysterious Caves, defeat the Mysterious Monsters and find the Mysterious Musical Notes that might make their singing a bit less awful.

Controls: Keyboard:

Cursor keys to move, Space to jump, Left Alt to sing.

Gamepad / touchscreen:

DPad to move, A to jump, B to sing.
